title: Apple (AAPL) Headlines Busy Week of Tech Earnings - Kiplinger's Personal Finance
content: Apple (AAPL) Headlines Busy Week of Tech Earnings  Kiplinger's Personal Finance
description: Our preview of the upcoming week's earnings reports includes Apple (AAPL), Alphabet (GOOGL), Microsoft (MSFT), Meta Platforms (FB), Amazon.com (AMZN) and Twitter (TWTR).
